name: Leviathan (itch) (EllenHouraisan)
description:
Hello. This is Hourai, a humble writer aspirant, and I set out to make a video game (or at the very least the prototype of one) in 200 days. This is the result.

Leviathan is a fangame of Yume Nikki, in which you explore the world of dreams belonging to a stranded girl. Much like in the original, everything is up for interpretation. The goal is to find all the "mods" scattered throughout the dreams.

It is currently in version 0.01, so any feedback is appreciated. I will continue to develop it and post updates at www.talesofwitchcraft.wordpress.com whenever a new version is in the works.

Thanks for playing!
